sentence.Network_en: Father used chortle over such funny jokes.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲以前一听到这样的笑话，总会哈哈大笑。

sentence.Network_en: Father used to chortle over the funny funny papers every Sunday.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲以前每个星期天看到滑稽报纸,总要哈哈大笑.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 各种笑用英语怎么说。。。 ... 9. Cachinnate 放声大笑 10. Chortle 欢笑；哈哈大笑 11. Deride 讥笑.
记忆英语单词方法 ... architecter （建筑师，缔造者）； chortle (开心地笑)， chuckle (轻声地笑)，.
各种笑用英语怎么说。。。 ... 9. Cachinnate 放声大笑 10. Chortle 欢笑；哈哈大笑 11. Deride 讥笑.
好词汇编 -... ... 14、 cackle—— （呵呵大笑）如母鸡生蛋后的叫声 15、 chortle—— 欢笑；咯咯地笑 16、 ridicule—— 嘲笑；讪笑.

list.abs: To utter a chortle or express with a chortle ., 大笑发出哈哈大笑或用哈哈大笑来表达.
深深拨动人民的心弦 strike the deep chord in the people高兴得咯咯直笑 chortle in one's joy混声合唱 a mixed chorus

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1871: coined by Lewis Carroll in Through the Looking Glass; probably a blend of chuckle and snort

entry.def: To chortle means to laugh in a way that shows you are very pleased.

example.ex: There was silence for a moment, then Larry began chortling like an idiot.
example.tran: 先是一阵沉默，然后拉里像个白痴似的呵呵笑起来。

auth_sentence.content: ; Or they simply chortle in your face.
auth_sentence.res_content: ; Or they simply chortle in your face.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: ; Or they simply chortle in your face.

auth_sentence.content: His chortle bottoms out into a relentless guffaw.
auth_sentence.res_content: His chortle bottoms out into a relentless guffaw.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His chortle bottoms out into a relentless guffaw.

auth_sentence.content: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.
auth_sentence.res_content: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.

sentences.en: When I told them what had happened to me, they all chortled with mirth.
sentences.cn: 我把我的事告诉他们以後，他们咯咯地笑起来了。
